title: Francesco Rosadini
text:
Profilepic




Francesco Rosadini
Welcome! This is the prototype of my new website always in progress. In this website you can know more about me, about what I consider my job and what I love to do.
I am a Masterâ€™s student in biology currently writing my thesis at the Max Planck Institute of Animal Behavior. I am investigating behavioral adaptation of the common shrew associated with environmental and physical shifts.
